text:
A 32-year-old farmer M. Muruganandam of Thimmur village near Kunnam was murdered at his residence on Friday.

Police said the two persons entered into the residence of Muruganandam while he was asleep in the early hours and attacked him with sickles. He died on the spot.

Muruganandam’s wife, Subithra, is alleged to have had an extra marital affair and is suspected to have helped the assailants commit the murder.

The Kunnam police have registered a case and are on the look-out for the accused.
title: Farmer murdered
